title: A rapid supercritical water approach for one-pot synthesis of a branched BiVO4/RGO composite as a Li-ion battery anode
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7699-7709
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07731D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dinesh Rangappa, Karnan Manickavasakam, Murthy Muniyappa, Chandrakantha Bekal, Satish Shenoy B, Izan Izwan Misnon, Manikandan Kandasamy, Manjunath Shetty
A BiVO4/RGO branched nanocomposite synthesized by SCW approach is reported with single-step one-pot scalable approach and is successfully tested for Li-ion battery anode.
